summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.6°C), inside temperature (down 1.7°C), and outside temperature (down 1.6°C) and drier conditions in outside humidity (down 5%).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 19 miles) and light levels (up 3451 lux) when compared to today.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 424m and a high of 972m, averaging 839.0m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, pleasant humidity levels and gentle breezes are expected. Possible light showers, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and periods of sunshine are expected. The weather will likely remain the same.
